51.title: "Where Do We Stand?"
51.author: Lloyd Ostendorf, art
51.appears_in: p. 25-31 in Treasure Chest of Fun and Fact, v. 6, no. 2 (Sept. 28, 1950).
notes: Begins: "Another strike! My day says they should pass a law against labor union strikes. Well, my dad says unions are good things. Are strikes ever good things? I'm going to ask sister."
Includes a list of "source material," i.e., a list of statements about strikes by Popes and other Catholic clergy.
